sections.summary:
Passionate and dedicated Theater Arts Teacher with expertise in secondary curriculum development, classroom management, relationship building,
continued professional development and management of a successful Theater Arts program for over six years.
Highlights
Valid and Current Teaching Certification in Texas Talented mediator
Strong communication skills Self-motivated
Talented public speaker Results-oriented
